events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing and evaluation.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the recruitment process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and experience relevant to the software engineer role.
Thank you for the informative screening. I am very interested in moving forward with the technical interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-20 at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
